moves.name: Stand LP
moves.notes: Different stand LP from the level 1 Drink Level version

moves.name: Stand MP
moves.notes: Jamie's main frametrap / combo tool

moves.name: Stand HP
moves.notes: Very fast start-up and fast 3-hit string makes this a super strong tool against Drive Impacts and other armor moves

moves.name: Stand LK
moves.notes: Chains into crouch LP / crouch LK / stand LK

moves.name: Stand MK
moves.notes: Great poke and buffer tool at close / mid-range

moves.name: Stand HK
moves.notes: Causes a crumple-like free juggle state on a grounded Punish Counter (opponent is in a grounded state for +9 frames before going airborne)

moves.name: Crouch LP
moves.notes: Chains into crouch LP / crouch LK / stand LK

moves.name: Crouch MP
moves.notes: Good combo / buffer / frametrap tool with strong hitbox priority

moves.name: Crouch HP
moves.notes: Forces stand

moves.name: Crouch LK
moves.notes: Chains into crouch LP / crouch LK / stand LK

moves.name: Crouch MK
moves.notes: Incurs 20% hit damage scaling penalty if used as the first hit of a combo

moves.name: Crouch HK
moves.notes: Second hit has quite bit a further range than the first hit

moves.name: Jump LP
moves.notes: Cross-up

moves.name: Jump MP
moves.notes: Puts airborne opponents into a juggle state

moves.name: Jump HP
moves.notes: Spikes down airborne opponents

moves.name: Jump LK
moves.notes: Has the furthest horizontal range of all of Jamie's jump-ins

moves.name: Jump MK
moves.notes: Cross-up

moves.name: Jump HK
moves.notes: Amazing air-to-air / anti-air tool due to the rewards it leads to on airborne hit

moves.name: Indian Step
moves.notes: Chains into crouch LP / crouch LK / stand LK

moves.name: Tensei Kick
moves.notes: Jamie's head and kicking leg hurtboxes are invincible to airborne strikes on frames 9-11 (during the 3 active frames)

moves.name: Falling Star Kick
moves.notes: Overhead

moves.name: Hermit's Elbow
moves.notes: Jamie pulls back his hurtboxes on frames 5-12 before striking back with his elbow (can be used to avoid throws and attacks, and then Punish Countering them)

moves.name: Senei Kick
moves.notes: Not a low attack (despite what it looks like)

moves.name: Phantom Sway
moves.notes: Jamie's optimal juggle ender to raising his drink levels

moves.name: Phantom Sway + Drink
moves.notes: Grants +1 Drink Level to Jamie

moves.name: Back Shaver
moves.notes: Throw Loop: Dash up for +4 mixup between throw/strike (not possible on mid-screen back-roll)

moves.name: Wheel Punch
moves.notes: Back Throw Loop: Can Drive Rush into meaty strike / throw mix when performed while cornered

moves.name: Drive Impact: Vainglory Strike
moves.notes: 2 hits of armor on frames 1-27

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Leg Sweep
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frames 1-22 (frames 1-20 when used on wake-up as a Reversal)

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.notes: Parries all strikes and projectiles (high and low) from frame 1

moves.name: Drive Rush
moves.notes: Dashes forward and enhances the next normal used out of the Drive Rush with +4 extra hitstun / blockstun (some moves also get unique properties enhanced such as juggle state)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Strikes
moves.notes: Cancelable into follow-up Punch / Kick rekkas (Punch rekkas can even be performed on whiff)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Strikes 2
moves.notes: Can be performed on whiff (but is delayed a few frames compared to when performed on hit / block)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Strikes 3
moves.notes: Can be performed on whiff (but is delayed a few frames compared to when performed on hit / block)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Kicks 2
moves.notes: First kick follow-up is only possible on Hit / Block (not on whiff like the punch follow-ups)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Kicks 3
moves.notes: Grants +1 Drink Level to Jamie as well as restoring 1/2 extra bar of Drive Gauge | 1/12th (~8%) of Burnout Gauge

moves.name: MP Freeflow Strikes
moves.notes: Cancelable into follow-up Punch / Kick rekkas (Punch rekkas can even be performed on whiff)

moves.name: MP Freeflow Strikes 2
moves.notes: Can be performed on whiff (but is delayed a few frames compared to when performed on hit / block)

moves.name: MP Freeflow Kicks 3

moves.name: OD Freeflow Strikes

moves.name: OD Freeflow Kicks 2
moves.notes: First kick follow-up is only possible on Hit / Block (not on whiff like the punch follow-ups)

moves.name: OD Freeflow Kicks 3
moves.notes: Only Drink Rekka ender that's + on knockdown, granting Jamie an oki situation when used on a cornered opponent

moves.name: LP Swagger Step
moves.notes: A lot of active frames can be made + on block via spacing or oki

moves.name: MP Swagger Step
moves.notes: A lot of active frames can be made + on block via spacing or oki

moves.name: HP Swagger Step
moves.notes: Safe on block unlike LP/MP Palm and also +42 KD which sets Jamie up for a safe jump (same as his LK Breakdance at Drink Levels 2+)

moves.name: OD Swagger Step
moves.notes: Sends opponents tumbling backwards (can hit them OTG in this tumbling state)

moves.name: Intoxicated Assault 1 (Drink 3)
moves.notes: Cancelable into all Supers on Hit / Block

moves.name: Intoxicated Assault 2 (Drink 3)
moves.notes: Airborne on frames 18-27 (Forced Knockdown state) on the last HK hit

moves.name: Back Shaver
moves.notes: Throw Loop: Dash up for +4 mixup between throw/strike (not possible on mid-screen back-roll)

moves.name: Wheel Punch
moves.notes: Back Throw Loop: Can Drive Rush into meaty strike / throw mix when performed while cornered

moves.name: Drive Impact: Vainglory Strike
moves.notes: 2 hits of armor on frames 1-27

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Leg Sweep
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frames 1-22 (frames 1-20 when used on wake-up as a Reversal)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Strikes
moves.notes: Cancelable into follow-up Punch / Kick rekkas (Punch rekkas can even be performed on whiff)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Strikes 2
moves.notes: Can be performed on whiff (but is delayed a few frames compared to when performed on hit / block)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Strikes 3
moves.notes: Can be performed on whiff (but is delayed a few frames compared to when performed on hit / block)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Kicks 2
moves.notes: First kick follow-up is only possible on Hit / Block (not on whiff like the punch follow-ups)

moves.name: LP Freeflow Kicks 3
moves.notes: Grants +1 Drink Level to Jamie as well as restoring 1/2 extra bar of Drive Gauge | 1/12th (~8%) of Burnout Gauge

moves.notes: Can be performed on whiff (but is delayed a few frames compared to when performed on hit / block)

moves.name: OD Freeflow Kicks 2
moves.notes: First kick follow-up is only possible on Hit / Block (not on whiff like the punch follow-ups)

moves.name: OD Freeflow Kicks 3
moves.notes: Only Drink Rekka ender that's + on knockdown, granting Jamie an oki situation when used on a cornered opponent

moves.name: LP Swagger Step
moves.notes: A lot of active frames can be made + on block via spacing or oki

moves.name: MP Swagger Step
moves.notes: A lot of active frames can be made + on block via spacing or oki

moves.name: HP Swagger Step
moves.notes: Safe on block unlike LP/MP Palm and also +42 KD which sets Jamie up for a safe jump (same as his LK Breakdance at Drink Levels 2+)

moves.name: OD Swagger Step
moves.notes: Sends opponents tumbling backwards (can hit them OTG in this tumbling state)

moves.name: LK Arrow Kick
moves.notes: Invincible to airborne strikes on frames 1-11

moves.name: MK Arrow Kick
moves.notes: Invincible to airborne strikes on frames 1-14

moves.name: HK Arrow Kick
moves.notes: Invincible to airborne strikes on frames 1-16

moves.name: OD Arrow Kick
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frames 1-9

moves.name: Luminous Dive Kick (Drink 1)
moves.notes: Not an Overhead

moves.name: OD Luminous Dive Kick (Drink 1)
moves.notes: Puts opponent into a limited OTG juggle state

moves.name: LK Bakkai (Drink 2)
moves.notes: Projectle invincible on frames 3-43 (until end of active frames)

moves.name: MK Bakkai (Drink 2)
moves.notes: Projectle invincible on frames 4-59 (until end of active frames)

moves.name: HK Bakkai (Drink 2)
moves.notes: Projectle invincible on frames 5-92 (until end of active frames)

moves.name: OD Bakkai (Drink 2)
moves.notes: Projectle invincible on frames 3-100 (until end of active frames)

moves.name: Tenshin (Drink 3)
moves.notes: Range: 0.96

moves.name: OD Tenshin (Drink 3)
moves.notes: Range: 0.96

moves.name: Breakin'
moves.notes: Strike and Throw invincible on frames 1-12

moves.name: Getsuga Saiho
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frames 1-12

moves.name: Getsuga Saiho (Critical Art)
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frames 1-12

moves.name: Stand LP
moves.notes: Very good range for a light normal (slightly shorter range hitbox for crouching opponents)

moves.name: Stand MP
moves.notes: Jamie's main frametrap / combo tool

moves.name: Stand HP
moves.notes: Very fast start-up and fast 3-hit string makes this a super strong tool against Drive Impacts

moves.name: Stand LK
moves.notes: Chains into crouch LP / crouch LK / stand LK

moves.name: Stand MK
moves.notes: Great poke and buffer tool at close / mid-range

moves.name: Stand HK
moves.notes: Causes a crumple-like free juggle state on a grounded Punish Counter (opponent is in a grounded state for +9 frames before going airborne)

moves.name: Crouch LP
moves.notes: Chains into crouch LP / crouch LK / stand LK

moves.name: Crouch MP
moves.notes: Good combo / buffer / frametrap tool with strong hitbox priority

moves.name: Crouch HP
moves.notes: Forces stand

moves.name: Crouch LK
moves.notes: Chains into crouch LP / crouch LK / stand LK

moves.name: Crouch MK
moves.notes: Incurs 20% hit damage scaling penalty if used as the first hit of a combo

moves.name: Crouch HK
moves.notes: Second hit has quite bit a further range than the first hit

moves.name: Jump LP
moves.notes: Cross-up

moves.name: Jump MP
moves.notes: Puts airborne opponents into a juggle state

moves.name: Jump HP
moves.notes: Spikes down airborne opponents

moves.name: Jump LK
moves.notes: Has the furthest horizontal range of all of Jamie's jump-ins

moves.name: Jump MK
moves.notes: Cross-up

moves.name: Jump HK
moves.notes: Amazing air-to-air / anti-air tool due to the rewards it leads to on airborne hit

moves.name: Indian Step
moves.notes: Chains into crouch LP / crouch LK / stand LK

moves.name: Tensei Kick
moves.notes: Jamie's head and kicking leg hurtboxes are invincible to airborne strikes on frames 9-11 (during the 3 active frames)

moves.name: Falling Star Kick
moves.notes: Overhead

moves.name: Hermit's Elbow
moves.notes: Jamie pulls back his hurtboxes on frames 5-12 before striking back with his elbow (can be used to avoid throws and attacks, and then Punish Countering them)

moves.name: Senei Kick
moves.notes: Not a low attack (despite what it looks like)

moves.name: Phantom Sway
moves.notes: Jamie's optimal juggle ender to raising his drink levels

moves.name: Phantom Sway + Drink
moves.notes: Restores 1 extra bar of Drive Gauge | 1/6th (~17%) of Burnout Gauge

moves.name: Bitter Strikes 1 (Drink 1)
moves.notes: Good checking tool in neutral against incoming moves like Drive Rush

moves.name: Bitter Strikes 2 (Drink 1)
moves.notes: Primary combo tool

moves.name: Full Moon Kick (Drink 2)
moves.notes: 17F Target Combo hit confirm window makes this a hit confirmable low crushing Overhead that leads to a drink (nice!)
